CutSceneText.Text: Ah, a living being...! Surely the Light has answered my prayers!
You! Why do you appear to Trou, the priest, and trouble his dreams?
I need one who still lives in the world...
to be the instrument of my revenge.
We asked Nerison for help when the Krall threatened,
but he refused our pleas for reinforcements.
The Krall overran the Manor and slaughtered us.
Because of Nerison we are all dead.
Make Nerison pay for what he did!
